resources.string: Leading University Bus Reservation And Tracking System.
You Have to Login First to Use Our Every Features
To Reserve A Seat & Get Ticket
You have to choose the point where you will take the bus & Select a seat (one person can select maximum two seat)
Our goal is to give you needed service and enhance our Application capacity more, Do give us Feedback
You can track the realtime location of your reserved bus
